title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.9 - Policies with flexible premium payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.9 - Policies with flexible premium payments

State Regulations

If the policy allows for flexible premium payments, then the maximum amount to be waived for a period may not exceed the greater of the smallest premium that will keep the policy from lapsing until the end of that period and the amount of premium needed to satisfy the no-lapse guarantee, if any, that expires next. Notes

46.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
